text.font-family: Operator Mono A, Operator Mono B, Fira Code, Menlo, Monaco
text.style: -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: start; font-family: "Operator Mono A", "Operator Mono B", "Fira Code", Menlo, Monaco; font-size: 14px;

rect.style: -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); font-family: "Operator Mono A", "Operator Mono B", "Fira Code", Menlo, Monaco;
rect.font-family: Operator Mono A, Operator Mono B, Fira Code, Menlo, Monaco

text.font-family: Operator Mono A, Operator Mono B, Fira Code, Menlo, Monaco

text.font-family: Operator Mono A, Operator Mono B, Fira Code, Menlo, Monaco
text.style: -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); text-anchor: start; font-family: "Operator Mono A", "Operator Mono B", "Fira Code", Menlo, Monaco; font-size: 14px;
text.tspan: question = string What is the area of a trapezoid with bottom side {bottom}{unit}, top side {top}{unit} and height {height}{unit}
